author: kyoon-mit
body:
Initial adjustments to the trackster parameters in RecoHGCal/TICL for better reco in the HFNose area. Future studies will improve the optimization.

The following changes have been made for HFNose:
- Changed propagator for TrackSeedingRegion from default (PropagatorWithMaterial) to RungeKuttaTrackerPropagator. (See [these slides](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1050783/contributions/4414855/attachments/2274849/3864237/CMS_Pixel_HFNose_Propagator_July_1_2021.pdf) -- further investigation revealed that RK is the best option for this task.)
- Included Trk in the iteration and updated HAD.
- Adjusted parameters for TrkEM, EM, Trk, and HAD.
- Made tighter constraint on cutTk parameter in TrackSeedingRegion to suppress fake tracks.
- Calibrated RecHits energies for HFNose.

The following will be done _in the future_.
- Further optimize parameters based on better understanding of EM & HAD events.
- Train energy & ID model for HFNose, and set pid_threshold to a value above zero.

==== Performance plots ====
Event Generation:
1000 events (2000 particles) each of the following. Single electron, photon, and charged pion, at E = 50, 100, ... , 300 GeV and || = 3.5.
